tweets.text: More to shares on $CRON promote later (like 0.40 cost/g claim for Phase I of Kibutz Gan Shmuel = specious. Biological asset assumptions ~ cash cost of $1.34, which is 12% below Q2'18 reported & $8.50/g ASP assumption, or 30% premium Q2’18 actual ASP/g of just $6.53 ASP/g. #FAKE

Kudos to @CitronResearch for highlighting $CRON, although we believe the $3.50 price target is generous.
US investors have only 3 real choices to “trade”  US-listed Canadian cannabis names TLRY, CGC (both real) and CRON (fake) (1/n)
